db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates calling Java code from an Android application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += quick androidextras
ANDROID_PACKAGE_SOURCE_DIR = $$PWD/android-sources
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ notificationclient.cpp
OTHER_FILES += \ qml/main.qml \ android-sources/src/org/qtproject/example/notification/NotificationClient.java \ android-sources/AndroidManifest.xml
RESOURCES += \ main.qrc
HEADERS += \ notificationclient.h
